pages.text: I’ve used RF and FE as synonyms in the previous entry and while that might be pretty accurate, you might be wondering what the difference truly is. Currently the official measure of power is Forge Energy, so $(l)all machines are technically running on FE$(reset).

A part of them still display RF though, as it was the unofficial standard measure before FE was introduced, so mods are still displaying it for those still used to the past. For your purposes, $(l)there’s no difference between them$(reset).
